name: The Prevaricators
description:
The Prevaricators

Following a murder in an old mansion, it's up to you to find out who did it! Interrogate and cross reference the suspects to find out who is innocent, and who is guilty. Find the murderer, or they might find you!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • W or Up Arrow to enter doors
  • Space to talk to a suspect
  • Click to add notes

Tips:

  • The murderer will always have at least two people accusing them.
  • The murderer will always arrive alone.
  • The murderer will always speak of a painting that can't be found.
  • Take note of what the suspects say!

This game was created for the very first BenBonk game jam. Jammers were instructed to create a game based on the theme "Trust No One". You can see BenBonk's YouTube channel at youtube.com/benkbonk

Please leave a comment if you enjoyed the game! (Or if you didn't! Tell me how much it sucks. :P)
